remarks: If ` X ` is in the span of ` A u. { Y } ` but not ` A ` , then ` Y ` is in the span of ` A u. { X } ` .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Jun-2014.)
statement:
lspsolv.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
lspsolv.s $e |- S = ( LSubSp ` W ) $.
lspsolv.n $e |- N = ( LSpan ` W ) $.
lspsolv $p |- ( ( W e. LVec /\ ( A C_ V /\ Y e. V /\ X e. ( ( N ` ( A u. { Y } ) ) \ ( N ` A ) ) ) ) -> Y e. ( N ` ( A u. { X } ) ) ) $.
